Class ReflectionUtil

  • Object
    • ReflectionUtil

  • public class ReflectionUtil
extends Object
    This class gathers static methods to ease reflection procedures.
    Author:
    GTouya

      • getInheritanceDepth

        public static int getInheritanceDepth(Class<?> baseClass,
                                      Class<?> subClass)
        Determine the depth of inheritance between a super class (baseClass) and one of its sub classes (subClass). It corresponds to the number inheritances in the OO hierarchy of classes (and interfaces) between both classes (e.g. 1 for direct inheritance).
        Parameters:
        baseClass -
        subClass -
        Returns:
        the depth of inheritance (-1 if baseClass is not assignable from subClass)

      • isDirectBaseClass

        public static boolean isDirectBaseClass(Class<?> baseClass,
                                        Class<?> subClass)
        Determine if a class object (baseClass) is a direct base class in the OO sense of another class (subClass). In Java, it means that baseClass is the superclass or one of the implemented interfaces of subClass.
        Parameters:
        baseClass -
        subClass -
        Returns:

        public static Set<String> findImplementations(String pckgname,
                                              Class<?> baseClass)
        Scan a package for class implementation of a given interface. It scans the files contained in the pkgname. It returns the class names which are implementing the interface AND has a default empty constructor
